channel.title: Connecting Midi Keyboard Controller to Control Patch
channel.description:
Feeling a little silly not being able to figure it out, but want to get my little midi controller to control the patch rather than the keyboard in the window, but it's not really working out... is there an example patch? What objects should I be using?
Very new to Axoloti!

item.title: Connecting Midi Keyboard Controller to Control Patch
item.dc:creator: @clpng
item.description:
@clpng wrote:

Thanks so much! It all came down to non-compatible hardware. Once I switched keyboards, your advice worked great!

Read full topic
item.source: Connecting Midi Keyboard Controller to Control Patch

item.title: Connecting Midi Keyboard Controller to Control Patch
item.dc:creator: @valmir
item.description:
@valmir wrote:

Check out the midi/in objects, selecting one depending on what your controller produces (CC, notes). If you don't know rbrt/midi/in/monitor can be useful.

Read full topic
item.source: Connecting Midi Keyboard Controller to Control Patch
